content: Fabulous! I have this in my phone and play it for the children when I'm driving. They have it on their tablets and we love the ease in access. You should have the cycle 3 flash cards as well for history. I have already learned a ton along with my children and I love how we can work on past weeks and even go ahead and learn. My son likes to learn at a faster rate but my daughter likes to repeat a lesson many times! I love that I can fill the children in with other details and Google search.
Love having the Memory Work at the tip of my fingers! The app is easy to manage and we enjoy the eye-catching graphics. Just wish it included the Timeline song!
THIS WASS THE BESSSSTTTTT PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE APPPP!!!!

Not what I expected. I was expecting like what I purchased on the Itunes. With singing. This app is boring and monotone. Wish there was like a trial to see how it worked before I made the puchase. Cheaper on Itunes and WAY MORE FUN with the songs.
replyContent: I am sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the Foundations Memory Work app. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions to help improve this app in the future.

content: The app is great for what it has on it. It needs the timeline song with all the hand signs added, broken down by week and in its entirety. Also, where is the states and capitals song? This is my first year and we've been told it is to the tune of My Country this of Thee. Can't find that anywhere on YouTube where we've been instructed to find videos. Also, it needs to start where I want it too, not automatically at week 1. With those 3 additions I would give the app a 5 star rating.

Pricey for low quality My audio intermittently stops working on specific weeks. This could be designed to be more interactive, like a quiz. This could also include a portion that just gives you the prompts for history sentences and allows the students to practice their memory work. This is low quality with a big price tag. CC needs to look into interactive apps and up their game or bring their price tag down to match the low quality, poor functioning app they have created.
replyContent: Hi Brittney, we are sorry to hear about the issues you are having. Please e-mail our customer service department at customerservice@classicalconversations.com for help.

content: Super glitchy. No ability to adjust settings. The content starts playing immediately when you click on the subject before you have a chance to select the week so I am always having to open a subject and the immediately hit pause, which sometimes causes the app to glitch. It would be nice to be in control of when the audio begins playing.
The week 2 history isn't working
replyContent: Hi Meagan, we are sorry to hear about the issues you are having. Please e-mail our customer service department at customerservice@classicalconversations.com for help.

content: Felt misled when original purchase was removed. I purchased all 3 cycles from Amazon app store. CC has since unpublished there. We can no longer install the app since it's unpublished (per Amazon support - only works if already installed, no reinstalling since it's gone). At launch, expectations were set for multiple years of use. Now I must purchase all three cycles AGAIN if I still want to use them. Outstanding app but expensive since I have to keep buying it. No response from CC.
It would be great if it had the music for the songs. That's the main reason why I purchased it. Got a refund.
I can't seem to find some of the songs. The states and capitals song and the timeline song? Does this app not offer them?
replyContent: Hi Ashley - We're sorry that the app didn't meet your expectations. Our Foundations Memory Work apps have some of the songs from the Foundations Audio CD sets but not all of them.

content: Not worth the money unless you are on the go but even then not impressed.

so not worth it it keeps on freezing restarting on its own closing itself out it needs work

content: I'm having an issue with the app right now, in the math strand of weeks 6 and 7 the audio isn't playing. The same goes for the cycle 2 app from last year, week 6 and 7 math strand audio isn't playing.

content: My daughter uses this app daily during the school year. Easy to use and convenient.
Updated and makes review time much easier.
replyContent:
Hi BK, 

We mistakenly added the "Now updated for the Fifth Edition of the Foundations Curriculum!" wording to this product page too early. We apologize for the confusion. The 5th edition update for the Android Foundations Memory Work Cycle 3 app has not been released yet but should be coming soon!

content: Very good ðŸ˜Š
My daughter loves to use the app to review her memory work.

Still not updated to reflect the fifth edition. It is incorrectly labeled that it IS updated. I saw another review mention this and they have yet to remove the false advertisement. I paid $15 for an app that I can't even use. I read the update would be "soon", but that was stated in June. Now we are just a few weeks away from the start of community and as a tutor I can't prep with sufficient time. Don't waste your time with the app. Buy the CDs.

This app worked great for us this year. 4 stars instead of 5 because no 
timeline song. We had to use the CD for that. But we used this app to 
review the other subjects. Being able to choose subject and week separately 
was helpful. We will definitely purchase the cycle 1 app.
Really helpful with all memory work

It contains the basic memory work. However, it needs some improvements. 1. 
Have a section that is organized by week. 2. Include the timeline song. 3. 
Include ALL of the songs for every subject. 4. Timeline cards need to be 
larger. It would be more visually appealing.

Wish this had the all of the songs.. and the history song doesn't play all 
the way through unless you are touching the screen. It is nice to have 
everything at my fingertips, but it should include songs and all.
I love this app
Constantly freezing, requesting a refund
I wish you could have it auto repeat multiple times!
Can you add timeline song?  States song?  Latin song?

The geography is Not accurate.. I believe its just not compatible with the galaxy s8 because other users dont have the same problem. I contacted developer but its not yet resolved. Also I would like the timeline song on the app. And maybe some quizzes or  something additional than what we get from the tutorials on cc connected. IMO $16 is alot to pay for an app that doesn't offer more.

The content is the same as on the Cycle 3 CD's which is great! Exactly what I wanted. However, the app needs major improvement! One has to be constantly touching the app to click to the next subject/week. It needs an update that has a repeat and continuous play option so an entire week can be played all the way through like the CD plays all the way through each subject by week.

Not worth $16, I thought it was more like the songs on the cd's but each history sentence is read first and then the song plays. It doesn't work as well as I thought it would and it doesn't automatically play through allowing for easy review in the car. I really wish u had bought the cd's instead.
Thank you for adding this to Android!

Not a big fan. When the screen saver turns on the app turns off. We can't even make it through one song. I thought having it on my phone would keep me from being attached to my P.C. I guess I thought it would be more like the CD songs not exactly like C3.
